description: The generic collection point response schema

id.description: A unique identifier for this objects schema

createdAt.description: The time the request was sent by the client

integrationId.description: The identifier of the integration from which this response comes

reference.description: Same value as the reference supplied in the request

collectionPoints.description: Collection points retrieved from the carrier integration

result.description: For any given collection point request, this should be included in the final collection point response provided by the carrier integration.  Its presence indicates no more collection points are forthcoming.

success.description: Set to true if all collection points were successfully retrieved from the carrier, and communicated to the platform.

message.description: An optional message associated with the conclusion of the collection point responses.  This can be an error message, or details of success.
